content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace array at position(0, 0)
Consists of following entities
- Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 2.0)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors related to insufficient ingredients in furnaces
- Ensure that you have the necessary ingredients in your inventory to supply the furnaces. Check the recipes and ensure you are collecting the required materials.

### Errors when attempting to craft items without resources
- Always verify your inventory before attempting to craft items. If you lack the required resources, gather them first to avoid crafting errors.
